<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_1020</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_1020</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Aritmética financiera</string>
            <string language="en">Financial arithmetic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finanzielle Arithmetik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arithmétique financière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aritmética financeira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aritmetica finanziaria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικονομική αριθμητική</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones algunas aplicaciones de la matemática financiera. Se estudia el cálculo de intereses para hipotecas y planes de pensiones.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain some applications in financial arithmetic. It studies how to calculate the interest rates for mortgages and pension plans.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">hipoteca</string>
            <string language="en">mortgage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">matemática financiera</string>
            <string language="en">mathematical finance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">interés</string>
            <string language="en">interest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plan de pensiones</string>
            <string language="en">pension plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, einige Anwendungen in der finanziellen Arithmetik zu 
erklären. Sie studiert, wie man die Zinssätze für Hypotheken 
und Rentenversicherungen errechnet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer quelques applications dans l'arithmétique 
financière. Elle étudie comment calculer les taux d'intérêt 
d'intérêt pour des hypothèques et des plans de retraite de 
retraite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
algumas aplicações na aritmética financeira. Estuda como 
calcular as taxas de interesse para mortgages e plantas de pensão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare alcune applicazioni nell'aritmetica finanziaria. Studia
come calcolare i tassi di interesse per le ipoteche ed i programmi di 
pensione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει μερικές εφαρμογές στην οικονομική αριθμητική. 
Μελετά πώς να υπολογίσει τα επιτόκια για τις υποθήκες και 
τα συνταξιοδοτικά σχέδια.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hypothek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mathematische Finanzierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interesse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rentenversicherung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">hypothèque</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">finances mathématiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">intérêt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de retraite de retraite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mortgage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">finanças matemáticas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interesse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta de pensão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interesse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di pensione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαθηματική χρηματοδότηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συνταξιοδοτικό σχέδιο</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
